title: Google to Ditch Two Colours for the Upcoming Pixel 10 Series, Leaks Say
description: Not even Mario can plug up these leaks. The post Google to Ditch Two Colours for the Upcoming Pixel 10 Series, Leaks Say appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Not even Mario can plug up these leaks.
text: Following recent leaked information that the Pixel 10 will launch later this coming August, it seems that we now have another tidbit to add to the steady stream of Pixel leaks concerning Google’s latest smartphone series. More specifically, a new set of information reveals that Google will introduce several new colour options for the new devices. READ: Google Pixel 10 release date, pre-orders, and launch window now confirmed As reported by the folks over at Android Headlines, the Pixel 10 series will not come in Obsidian and Porcelain (aka black and white), but will instead be available in a more varied palette of colors. The standard Google Pixel 10 is expected to be available in Ultra Blue, Limoncello, Iris, andMidnight, while the Google Pixel 10 Pro and Google Pixel 10 Pro XL will come in Sterling Gray, Light Porcelain, Midnight, and Smoky Green. Meanwhile, the Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold is rumored to come in Sterling Grey and Smoky Green. Recently, it was reported that Google is giving select members of its Super Fan users an early sneak peek into the Pixel 10 series, which is expected to arrive later in August, with availability starting on August 28.
html:
Following recent leaked information that the Pixel 10 will launch later this coming August, it seems that we now have another tidbit to add to the steady stream of Pixel leaks concerning Google’s latest smartphone series. More specifically, a new set of information reveals that Google will introduce several new colour options for the new devices.

READ: Google Pixel 10 release date, pre-orders, and launch window now confirmed

As reported by the folks over at Android Headlines, the Pixel 10 series will not come in Obsidian and Porcelain (aka black and white), but will instead be available in a more varied palette of colors. The standard Google Pixel 10 is expected to be available in Ultra Blue, Limoncello, Iris, andMidnight, while the Google Pixel 10 Pro and Google Pixel 10 Pro XL will come in Sterling Gray, Light Porcelain, Midnight, and Smoky Green. Meanwhile, the Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold is rumored to come in Sterling Grey and Smoky Green.

Recently, it was reported that Google is giving select members of its Super Fan users an early sneak peek into the Pixel 10 series, which is expected to arrive later in August, with availability starting on August 28.
